about_the_game:
Coding Learn is a game that will help you learn the basics of programming using c# as an example. Travel with the robot, help him solve puzzles and move together towards the cherished goal!
There are three levels available in the demo:
1) Teaching the interface and working with variables
2) Arithmetic tasks using built-in methods
3) Branches

Task List

1st Level

1)using Methods

2) Using Methods With Arguments

3) Declaring Variables Of Different Types

4) Var

5) Arithmetic (int)

6) Arithmetic (float)

7) Reduced Operations

8) Remainder of division (Integer division, division of fractional numbers)
2nd level:
1) Repetition of an old theme
2) Choosing the right variable name
3) Problem on Math Round
4) Task on pow, cast
5) Using multiple methods
3rd level:
1) logical operations more and less
2) Comparing variables with values
3) The problem of finding the median using branches
4)Bool
5) Repetition
6)switch case
7) Repetition of what has been learned
detailed_description:
Coding Learn is a game that will help you learn the basics of programming using c# as an example. Travel with the robot, help him solve puzzles and move together towards the cherished goal!
There are three levels available in the demo:
1) Teaching the interface and working with variables
2) Arithmetic tasks using built-in methods
3) Branches

Task List

1st Level

1)using Methods

2) Using Methods With Arguments

3) Declaring Variables Of Different Types

5) Arithmetic (int)

6) Arithmetic (float)

7) Reduced Operations

8) Remainder of division (Integer division, division of fractional numbers)
2nd level:
1) Repetition of an old theme
2) Choosing the right variable name
3) Problem on Math Round
4) Task on pow, cast
5) Using multiple methods
3rd level:
1) logical operations more and less
2) Comparing variables with values
3) The problem of finding the median using branches

6)switch case
7) Repetition of what has been learned
name: Coding Learn Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this game, you play as a robot that needs to get to a mysterious castle. To do this, you need to write code in C #, in order to write it you have created built-in hints, a theory with explicit video clips, and a compiler that will help you find and fix errors in the code.
